p: Tannic acid is known to have antioxidant properties, since it can bind and remove singlet oxygen ( 1O 2) from the cellular environment [ 122]. A 0.3% w/ v solution of persimmon, a tannin, could induce a 3.13 log 10 reduction in the infectivity of MS2. Electron microscopy confirmed that such exposure caused capsid denaturation [ 123].
